# Card Metadata Integration

## Description

Integrate card metadata sources (Scryfall API or static database) to provide enhanced card information throughout the application. This enables card names, sets, rarities, colors, and types to be displayed instead of just card IDs.

## Scope

This project focuses on:
- **Foundation**: Setting up card metadata source integration
- **Integration**: Applying metadata to collection viewer, deck viewer, and draft features

## Milestones

1. **Card Metadata Source** - Initial integration setup
2. **Full Integration** - Complete metadata integration across all features

## Implementation Phases

- **Phase 1: Foundation** - Set up card metadata source
- **Phase 2: Integration** - Integrate metadata into collection, deck, and draft features

## Timeline

- **Start Date**: 2025-11-15
- **End Date**: 2025-11-17
- **Duration**: 3 days (1 issue per day)
